    最近摘录

    On marriage

    日期： August 18, 2021 标签： #Kahlil Gibran #The Prophet #冰心

    On marriage 论婚姻 [[Kahlil Gibran]] [[卡里·纪伯伦]] [[冰心]] You were born together, and together you shall be forevermore. 你们一块儿出世，也要永远合一。 You shall be together when the white wings of death scatter your days. 在死的白翼隔绝你们的岁月的时候，你们也要合一。 Aye, you shall be together even in the silent memory of God. ...
